name: DrewIs Intelligence LLC - Services
description: A collection of professional services offered by DrewIs Intelligence LLC for AI-mediated discovery and generative engine optimization.

hasPart.name: AEO/GEO Consulting
hasPart.description: Strategic guidance on implementing AI Engine Optimization and Generative Engine Optimization for your business. Hourly or project-based consulting.

hasPart.name: Product Optimization
hasPart.description: Complete optimization of your products for AI discovery. We handle schema markup, zero-click cards, and implementation—delivered ready to deploy.

hasPart.name: Website Implementation
hasPart.description: Full website audit and optimization strategy. We analyze your site and provide actionable implementation plans for AEO/GEO compliance.

hasPart.name: Done-For-You Agency Services
hasPart.description: Complete hands-off implementation. We optimize your entire digital presence—websites, products, and content—for AI search engines.
